dataSet.name: DataSet1

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Quarter(HalfYearPeriod)<3 Then "Half-Year-1" ELSE "Half-Year-2" END
CASE WHEN TaxRate = 0 Then "Payment" ELSE String(TaxRate)+"%" END

CASE WHEN SalesTaxComponentRate = TaxRate Then SalesTaxComponentDescription + " (" + String(SalesTaxComponentRate) + ")" WHEN TaxRate = 0 Then "Payment" ELSE SalesTaxComponentDescription + " - Inactive "+"(" + String(TaxRate) + ")" END
CASE WHEN SalesTaxComponentRate = TaxRate Then SalesTaxComponentDescription WHEN TaxRate = 0 Then "Payment" ELSE SalesTaxComponentDescription + " - Inactive " END

dataSet.name: TotalBalances
dataSet.query: SELECT SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.ChargeType, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.Agency, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.TaxRate, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.SalesTaxComponent, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.TaxPayableOpeningBalance AS OpeningBalance, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.TaxPayableClosingBalance AS Balance FROM AccumulationRegister.SalesTaxOwed.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: DetailedBalances
dataSet.query: SELECT SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.ChargeType, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.Agency, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.TaxRate, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.SalesTaxComponent, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.TaxPayableOpeningBalance AS OpeningDetailedBalance, SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers.TaxPayableClosingBalance AS DetailedBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.SalesTaxOwed.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS SalesTaxOwedBalanceAndTurnovers

dataSet.name: GrossSales
dataSet.query:
SELECT ALLOWED GrossSalesWithAgencies.MonthPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.QuarterPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.HalfYearPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.YearPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.ChargeType, GrossSalesWithAgencies.Agency, SUM(GrossSalesWithAgencies.TotalGrossSales) AS TotalGrossSales FROM (SELECT GeneralJournalTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod AS HalfYearPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, VALUE(Enum.AccountingMethod.Accrual) AS ChargeType, -1 * GeneralJournalTurnovers.AmountRCTurnover AS TotalGrossSales, SalesTaxAgencies.Ref AS Agency FROM AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal.Turnovers(, , Auto, Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), , ) AS GeneralJournalTurnovers, Catalog.SalesTaxAgencies AS SalesTaxAgencies
UNION ALL
SELECT CashFlowDataTurnovers.MonthPeriod, CashFlowDataTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, CashFlowDataTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, CashFlowDataTurnovers.YearPeriod, VALUE(Enum.AccountingMethod.Cash), CASE WHEN NOT CashFlowDataTurnovers.Account IS NULL THEN -CashFlowDataTurnovers.AmountRCTurnover ELSE 0 END, SalesTaxAgencies.Ref FROM AccumulationRegister.CashFlowData.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS CashFlowDataTurnovers, Catalog.SalesTaxAgencies AS SalesTaxAgencies WHERE CashFlowDataTurnovers.Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income)) AS GrossSalesWithAgencies
GROUP BY GrossSalesWithAgencies.MonthPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.QuarterPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.HalfYearPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.YearPeriod, GrossSalesWithAgencies.ChargeType, GrossSalesWithAgencies.Agency

dataSet.name: TaxableSales
dataSet.query: SELECT DISTINCT BEGINOFPERIOD(SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.Period, MONTH) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.Period, QUARTER) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.Period, HALFYEAR) AS HalfYearPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.Period, YEAR) AS YearPeriod, SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.ChargeType AS ChargeType, SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.TaxableSaleReceipt AS TotalTaxableSales, SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, SalesTaxOwedTurnovers.Agency AS Agency FROM AccumulationRegister.SalesTaxOwed.Turnovers(, , Record, ) AS SalesTaxOwedTurnovers

dataSet.name: GrossSalesWithSalesTaxComponents

v8:item.v8:content: * Gross sales is the full amount of sales for the tax period, both taxable and non-taxable. It is not broken down by agency, so every agency shows the same gross sales amount for the same period.
